title: tanagilladA
sahitya:
tanagilldA vastuvelliddarEnu tanna manake bArada heNNu mecci bandarEnu


caraNam 1    AdaraNeyilladUTava mrtAnnavAdarEnu vAdisuva satisutaru iddu balavEnu 
krOdhavannu beLesuva sOdarigariddarEnu mAdigana maneyali maduveyAdarEnu
    caraNam 2    sAvigilladauSadhiyu sanci tumba iddarEnu dEvakI sutan-hogaLada kavitvavEnu 
hEvavillada gaNDu heccAgi bALidarEnu hAvina heDeyoLage haNaviddarEnu
    caraNam 3    sanmAna mADada dore sAvirAru koTTarEnu tanna tA tiLiyada jnAnavEnu 
cennAgi purandara viTTalana neneyadava sanyAsiyAdarEnu SaNDhandarEnu
